Over the last few months supermarket giant Aldi has been installing self-checkouts in some of its stores.
The self-service tills have divided shoppers, with some loving them - and others preferring … [+2026 chars]

articles.author: Sophie Buchan
articles.title: Warning to ATM cash machine users as TikTok account exposes money-stealing scam - Glasgow Live
articles.description: There's a lot of scams circulating at the moment and experts are warning anyone who uses ATMs to stay vigilant by checking surroundings and looking for suspicious machines.
articles.content:
ATM users are being warned about scams and urged to remain vigilant after a TikTok user almost walked away without cash.
The scam tricks customers into thinking that the cash-machine has stopped wor… [+7294 chars]
